devlog-yahoo.title: Dev Log: Yahoo! News-style Top – Nihatori Games
devlog-yahoo.description: Top page redesigned with Yahoo! News-style UI. Tab-based feed.
devlog-yahoo.intro: The top page now uses a Yahoo! News (mobile) style UI. Tabs switch between Top, Games, Hobby, Posts, Trending, Recommended. Display is controlled by data/feed.json.
devlog-yahoo.section1Text: Articles go in blog/ (one HTML per post), games in games/{slug}/. This dev log is the first article.

update-template.title: Nihatori Games Update Template (Short)
update-template.description: Short template for safe daily updates. Git / Cloudflare Pages basics.
update-template.intro: Nihatori Games runs on Cloudflare Pages + Git. Follow these steps and updates will always deploy and leave a history.
update-template.section3Text: nothing to commit, working tree clean means OK. Cloudflare Pages Deployments = Success means live.
update-template.section6Item1: Not deploying → forgot commit or check Deployments
update-template.section7Closing: This flow keeps updates simple, safe, and reversible.
